name: MOD Vanilla Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes:Creamy Musks, White Praline, Vanilla Absolute.Fragrance Description:Expressive and vibrant, MOD Vanilla opens with a luscious blend of dark plum and musk. A touch of gourmand is heightened to a sophisticated level with orris and praline. Vanilla absolute and cocoa unveil its unforgettable signature..About the Bottle:The MOD bottle design is a modern toast to the post mid-century fashion ethos. Something bold and interruptive done in a sculptural way with form and light. Subtle curves create this rounded mod shape where no two sides look the same.  One white and one pink with a frosted window encapsulating the essence of the two MOD fragrances, MOD Blush and MOD Vanilla..About the Fragrance:Choose to be an original with MOD, the fragrance collection from Ariana Grande. An elevated collection that celebrates both the power of duality and the intoxicating freedom of expression. Innovative and sexy, the fragrance duo of MOD Vanilla and MOD Blush create an intimate yet powerful experience.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Hydroxycitronellal.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to pulse points: wrist, chest, and neck.

shades.shade_name: 3.4 oz/ 100 ml eau de parfum spray
1 oz/ 30 ml eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells absolutely heavenly! Has subtle hints of cloud and god is a woman along with vanillau2026 good size bottle for the price, will probably last me 1-2 yearsu2026 definitely will repurchase!
